DOC.brief_summary: This study assess the accuracy of a blood pressure monitor designed to detect atrial fibrillation. Subjects use the blood pressure monitor on a daily basis for 30 days and compare the readings to an ECG done at the same time.
DOC.brief_title: Home Monitoring for Atrial Fibrillation Using a Microlife Blood Pressure Monitor
DOC.criteria: any of the following age 65 or older hypertension diabetes mellitus congestive heart failure previous stroke permanent pacemaker impalantable defibrillator
